title: Revealed: EU’s plan to sex up the European Parliament
description: Ahead of the European election, top MEPs think of ways to make the Parliament less, well, dull.

title: EU leaders approve using profits from frozen Russian assets
description: More than €200B in Russian assets are sitting in the EU.

title: Macron to Israel: Fight terrorism, don’t endanger civilians
description: 'I think we need a humanitarian truce now,' said the French president.

title: ‘Obsolete’ European Parliament committee structure set for shake-up
description: New digital, defense and enlargement committees are in the offing.

title: Boris Johnson to join right-wing broadcaster GB News
description: The former PM will join Nigel Farage and Jacob Rees-Mogg on the broadcaster's roster.

title: Elon Musk brands Scotland’s leader Humza Yousaf a ‘blatant racist’
description: Yousaf apparently brushed off the claim from the X owner, which was based on a three-year-old speech by the Scottish first minister.

title: US calls on UK to expand crackdown on Hamas financing
description: Deputy Secretary to the U.S. Treasury Wally Adeyemo is visiting London, Brussels and Berlin in the coming days to coordinate new sanctions.

title: EU countries tell Brussels to tighten its own belt
description: Some EU leaders have scoffed at requests for billions of euros on top of the bloc's regular budget.

title: ECB’s display of solidarity with Israel sparks internal furor
description: A goodwill gesture has propelled the central bank into a minefield far removed from its expertise and mandate.

title: Putin’s (still) not dead, Kremlin insists
description: Moscow denies that a doppelgänger has taken over.

title: Estonia says damage to Baltic Sea pipeline, cables is all linked
description: But let's 'not rush to premature conclusions,' adds PM Kaja Kallas.

title: EU offers more cash to fertilizer makers over fears of new energy crunch
description: The gas-dependent sector made record profits last year by raising fertilizer prices well above the increase in their production costs.

title: Green MEP faces re-selection battle amid bullying claims
description: German Green MEP Manuela Ripa is 'shocked' by allegations in an anonymous letter to her party.

title: London Mayor Sadiq Khan defies Labour line with call for Gaza cease-fire
description: His stance puts him at odds with Labour leader Keir Starmer.

title: Orbán’s Putin handshake was ‘middle finger’ to dying Ukrainians, says Xavier Bettel
description: Hungarian PM attracts more criticism for cozying up to Russian leader.

title: Russia is executing its own soldiers in Ukraine, says US
description: 'It’s barbaric,' US National Security Council spokesman says, as Moscow suffers 'significant losses' in new offensive on Ukraine's eastern front.

title: To the resc-EU? Von der Leyen likely to attend Sunak’s AI summit as snubs pile up
description: US President Joe Biden and now French President Emmanuel Macron are confirmed no-shows, but EU chief Ursula von der Leyen is now poised to attend.

title: Hamas tells Russia: We won’t release hostages without Israel cease-fire
description: Militant group claims it needs 'time' to find all the people it abducted to Gaza.

title: US strikes Iranian-backed ammo sites in Syria
description: Defense officials said that the sites were involved in strikes on U.S. troops.

title: Orbán wants Ukraine to ‘negotiate’ for military aid cash
description: SNEAK PEEK — As EU leaders meet again today, Viktor Orbán is still refusing to free more cash for military aid to Kyiv. — Ammunition: Beyond the pace of production, the next biggest issue is cost. — In Ukraine, the future of warfare is a $400 drone killing a $2 million tank. Good morning, and […]

title: EU finally answers telecom industry’s call for help
description: Intense lobbying by European telecoms operators has finally gained government attention for their calls for investment.

title: The enemies of democracy are testing us
description: The massacre by Hamas is not just an attack on Israel — it represents an assault on the West and is a moment of truth.

title: Li Keqiang, former Chinese premier, dead at 68
description: He had a heart attack, according to state media.

title: Panic! Russia sends France into a tailspin over bedbugs
description: Kremlin misinformation blamed for fear of a bedbug invasion in Paris.

title: EU leaders meet amid Israel-Hamas war
description: Presented by Efpia.
